name: Prof. Dr. M. M. Mafizur Rahman
Expert: Hepabilliary, Esophageal Cancer, Pancreatic & Laparoscopic Surgeon
details: Prof. Dr. M. M. Mafizur Rahman is a General Surgeon in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, PhD, MD, MS. He is a Professor in the Department of Surgery at Bangladesh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at City Hospital Limited, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. M. M. Mafizur Rahman at City Hospital Limited, Dhaka is 6pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday)

name: Dr. Afrin Sultana
details: Dr. Afrin Sultana is a General Surgeon in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS (DMC), FCPS (Surgery), MRCS (UK). She is a Registrar in the Department of Surgery at Holy Family Red Crescent Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at City Hospital Limited, Dhaka. Practicing hour of Dr. Afrin Sultana at City Hospital Limited, Dhaka is 8pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).

name: Dr. Sarwar Ahmed Sobhan
Expert: General, Laparoscopic & Hepatobiliary Pancreatic Surgery Specialist
details: Dr. Sarwar Ahmed Sobhan is a General Surgeon in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), FCPS (Surgery), MS (Hepatobiliary Surgery). He is a Consultant in the Department of Surgeon at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Al-Raji Hospital, Farmgate. Practicing hour of Dr. Sarwar Ahmed Sobhan at Al-Raji Hospital, Farmgate is 7pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

name: Lt. Col. Dr. Md. Momin Uddin Kallol
Expert: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Specialist & Head Neck Surgeon
details: Lt. Col. Dr. Md. Momin Uddin Kallol is a ENT Specialist in Dhaka. Her qualification is MBBS (SSMC), FCPS (ENT), DLO, MCPS, FICS (USA). She is a Classified ENT Specialist & Head Neck Surgeon in the Department of ENT at Combined Military Hospital, Dhaka. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Mirpur. Practicing hour of Lt. Col. Dr. Md. Momin Uddin Kallol at Islami Bank Hospital, Mirpur is Temporary Unavailable.

name: Prof. Dr. A K M A Sobhan

name: Dr. Md. Arifuzzaman

Arifuzzaman at Square Consultation & Diagnostic Center, Banani is 4pm to 7.30pm (Sat, Mon & Wednesday).

qualification: BDS (DU), MPH (Community Dentistry), PGT (Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery)

name: Dr. Ahmad Seraji
qualification: MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), MCPS, MS (Surgery), MS (Plastic Surgery), MRCS (UK)
